features.sectionTitle: 10+ Powerful Features for Your Daily Ibadah
features.sectionSubtitle: From Halal food scanning to AI-powered Islamic guidance — we've built everything you need to strengthen your faith.

halalScanner.description: Scan any food product barcode to instantly check if it's Halal or Haram. Get detailed ingredient analysis and E-code verification.

kabaLive.title: Live Kaaba Streaming
kabaLive.description: Watch the Holy Kaaba live 24/7 from Masjid al-Haram in Makkah. Feel connected to the sacred sanctuary anytime, anywhere.

quranRadio.title: 24/7 Quran Radio
quranRadio.description: Listen to beautiful Quran recitations around the clock. Multiple reciters and stations from across the Muslim world.

quranReader.title: Quran Reading
quranReader.description: Read the Holy Quran with beautiful Uthmani script, translations in 40+ languages, and audio recitation by renowned Qaris.

dhikrCounter.title: Dhikr Counter
dhikrCounter.description: Digital tasbeeh counter with haptic feedback, customizable dhikr lists, and daily goals to track your remembrance of Allah.

dailyVerse.title: Daily Verse & Hadith
dailyVerse.description: Start each day with inspiration. Receive a beautiful Quran verse and authentic hadith with explanation every morning.

prayerTimes.title: Prayer Times
prayerTimes.description: Accurate prayer times based on your location with customizable calculation methods, notifications, and Athan sounds.

qiblaFinder.title: Qibla Finder
qiblaFinder.description: Find the exact Qibla direction anywhere in the world using your phone's compass with beautiful visual guidance.

aiCoach.title: AI Islamic Assistant
aiCoach.description: Get answers to your Islamic questions from our AI assistant trained on authentic sources from Quran and Hadith.

islamicStories.title: Islamic Stories
islamicStories.description: Explore stories of the Prophets, Companions, and Islamic history with beautiful illustrations and audio narration.

faq.sectionSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about Islam & Deen Buddy and its features.

q1.question: How does the Halal Food Scanner work?
q1.answer: Simply scan any food product barcode using your phone's camera. Our app analyzes the ingredients against our comprehensive database of Halal/Haram ingredients, E-codes, and additives. You'll get an instant result showing whether the product is Halal, Haram, or requires further investigation.

q2.question: Are the prayer times accurate for my location?
q2.answer: Yes! Islam & Deen Buddy uses your GPS location and supports multiple calculation methods (MWL, ISNA, Egypt, Makkah, Karachi, and more) to ensure accurate prayer times. You can also manually adjust times if needed for your local mosque.

q3.question: Can I use the app offline?
q3.answer: Many features work offline including the Quran reader, Qibla compass, dhikr counter, and prayer times (once calculated). Features like live Kaaba streaming and Quran radio require an internet connection.

q4.question: Is the AI Islamic Assistant reliable?
q4.answer: Our AI assistant is trained on authentic Islamic sources including Quran, Sahih Hadith collections, and scholarly works. However, for personal religious matters, we always recommend consulting a qualified local scholar.

q5.question: How do I change the Quran reciter?
q5.answer: Go to Settings > Quran > Reciter and choose from over 30 world-renowned Qaris including Mishary Alafasy, Abdul Basit, Al-Sudais, and many more. Each reciter can be downloaded for offline listening.

q6.question: Is Islam & Deen Buddy free to use?
q6.answer: Yes! Islam & Deen Buddy is free to download and most features are available at no cost. We offer an optional premium subscription for additional features like ad-free experience and exclusive content.

q7.question: How can I set prayer time notifications?
q7.answer: Navigate to Settings > Notifications and enable alerts for each prayer. You can customize the notification sound, choose Athan or simple alert, and set reminder times before each prayer.

q8.question: Does the app support multiple languages?
q8.answer: Yes! Islam & Deen Buddy supports English, Arabic, Turkish, French, Spanish, German, and Dutch. Quran translations are available in over 40 languages.

q9.question: How do I track my Quran reading progress?
q9.answer: The app automatically bookmarks where you stopped reading. You can also set daily reading goals, track your Khatm progress, and view statistics on your reading habits in the Progress section.

q10.question: Can I customize the dhikr counter?
q10.answer: Absolutely! Create custom dhikr lists, set daily targets for each dhikr, enable haptic feedback, and track your progress over time. The app also includes pre-set collections for morning and evening adhkar.
